name: jsPlatform
short_description:
See more about jsplatform:
     http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jr-VL461x8I

Finally, JSPlatform v1.0 is released

A great web productivity interface integrating a web desktop, a php backend, javascript gui interface, supporting MySQL, Desktop, Window System

Drop an email if you need help installing if you don't know how

Working with projects:
- AceEditor
- TinyMCE
- MongoDB (thorugh OneDB package)

Featuring:
- Code in the cloud web os (through OneDB package)
- Connectivity to: FTTP, SFTP, SMB, MySQL
